com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder

Class RoutineConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.RoutineConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RoutineConfiguration

    public static class RoutineConfiguration.Builder
extends Object
    Builder of routine configurations.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RoutineConfiguration buildConfiguration()
      Builds and return the configuration instance.
      RoutineConfiguration.Builder onReadTimeout(RoutineConfiguration.TimeoutAction action)
      Sets the action to be taken if the timeout elapses before a result can be read from the output channel.

      Sets the timeout for an invocation instance to become available.

      Sets the order in which input data are collected from the input channel.

      • onReadTimeout

public RoutineConfiguration.Builder onReadTimeout(@Nullable
                                                 RoutineConfiguration.TimeoutAction action)

      • withAvailableTimeout

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder withAvailableTimeout(long timeout,
                                                        @Nonnull
                                                        TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets the timeout for an invocation instance to become available.

        By default the timeout is set to 0 to avoid unexpected deadlocks.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout.
        timeUnit - the timeout time unit.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified timeout is negative.
        NullPointerException - if the specified time unit is null.

      • withAvailableTimeout

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder withAvailableTimeout(@Nullable
                                                        TimeDuration timeout)
        Sets the timeout for an invocation instance to become available. A null value means that it is up to the framework to chose a default duration.

        By default the timeout is set to 0 to avoid unexpected deadlocks.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout.
        Returns:
        this builder.

public RoutineConfiguration.Builder withConfiguration(@Nonnull

        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:

      • withCoreInvocations

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder withCoreInvocations(int coreInvocations)
        Sets the number of invocation instances which represents the core pool of reusable invocations. A RoutineConfiguration.DEFAULT value means that it is up to the framework to chose a default number.
        Parameters:
        coreInvocations - the max number of instances.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is negative.

      • withInputSize

        @Nonnull
public RoutineConfiguration.Builder withInputSize(int inputMaxSize)
        Sets the maximum number of data that the input channel can retain before they are consumed. A RoutineConfiguration.DEFAULT value means that it is up to the framework to chose a default size.
        Parameters:
        inputMaxSize - the maximum size.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is less than 1.
